wikipedia_page.main:
Jamie Alexander Richards (born 24 June 1994) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for Truro City.
Born in Southend-on-Sea, he progressed through Plymouth Argyle's youth system to make his Football League debut in 2013.

response: * Jamie Richards (born 1957), cyclist from New Zealand
Jamie Richards competed in the individual road race event at the 1976 Summer Olympics; he did not finish the race.
Jamie Richards has a son, Shaun Richards, born in 1982.
